vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in IHARVESTNoMintRewardPool_Partial.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.6.11', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- IHARVESTNoMintRewardPool_Partial.sol#4 declares pragma solidity0.6.11
	- IHARVESTNoMintRewardPool_Partial.sol#5 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IHARVESTNoMintRewardPool_Partial.sol:
	- pragma solidity0.6.11 (IHARVESTNoMintRewardPool_Partial.sol#4): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
